operation.name: PUT
operation.documentation: Update the available bandwidth property by its link name. Set of linkname with different bandwidth can be updated here. This method returns a non-successful response if the bandwidth is not updated.
operation.parameter: Value of the Property. Description can be any string (Eg. 'Node1'), valid values for tier are non negative numbers, and valid values for forwarding are 0 for reactive and 1 for proactive forwarding.

outValue.documentation:
Response as dictated by the HTTP Response Status code 
Example:
Request URL:
http://localhost:8080/controller/nb/v2/sdni/default/property/linkbandwidth/JSONObject

operation.name: PUT
operation.documentation: Update the available bandwidth property. This method returns a non-successful response if the bandwidth is not updated.
operation.parameter: Name of the Property. Properties that can be configured are: description, forwarding(only for default container) and tier
Value of the Property. Description can be any string (Eg. 'Node1'), valid values for tier are non negative numbers, and valid values for forwarding are 0 for reactive and 1 for proactive forwarding.

outValue.documentation:
Response as dictated by the HTTP Response Status code 
Example:
Request URL:
http://localhost:8080/controller/nb/v2/sdni/default/property/bandwidth/5
